trans-unit.source: Creates a TextureBrush object based on an image, a defining rectangle, and a set of image properties

target.mrk: Parameters

trans-unit.source: Pointer to an image object

target.mrk: Pointer to an image object

trans-unit.source: Leftmost coordinate of the image portion to be used by this brush

trans-unit.source: a pointer to a new TextureBrush object.

target.mrk: a pointer to a new TextureBrush object.

trans-unit.source: False and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended may contain GPSTATUS error code ($GPID_ERR*).

trans-unit.source: After you are done with the object, call _GDIPlus_BrushDispose() to release the object resources.
